definitions.definition: A substance composed of a large collection of bubbles or their solidified remains.
definitions.example: He doesn't like so much foam in his beer.

definitions.definition: A substance formed by trapping pockets of gas in a liquid or solid.
definitions.example: A foam mat can soften a hard seat.
He is in Europe, across the foam.

definitions.definition: To spew saliva as foam, to foam at the mouth.
